title: GD Rivalry!
body:
Who wants a chance to whoop me at the Oceanic LOL Cup!
Or are you all a bunch of whiny kittens!

replies.body:
Oceanic LOL Cup?

Don't you have to pay for that?

$25 entry per team, minimum 5 games played because of round robin stage.

So even if you don't get passed round robin you pay $1 per game per person
I would totally go for it except that I don't have 5 people to play with and I'll probably be busy.

Musterpulse was looking for people!
You could be on a GD team with 7 people, so that you could have 2 off a week!

Go on do it!

I can beat anyone here with my eyes closed, blind folded, 1 hand mouse only (standard mouse), with right click disabled and on default key configuration.

Sadly I no longer play so it's impossible for you to experience the terror now huehuehue.

Grind before May!
And ill whoop you bum bum!
I could beat everyone on these boards with my eyes closed.
Put your money where you mouth is!!

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=KoGEjL0X,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-04-06T06:27:38.972+0000)
>
> FTFY

That to, I am rather talented in that department to.

I'm the ADC.
And I'm normally a support main.

I'm making it easy.
# #NEVERSURRENDER WILL PREVAIL VICTORIOUS
Recruiting a challenger support, and then changing to being the ADC, hacks confirmed.

You dare enter the love shack that is the bot lane with my dear Rindaa and I.
You dare the dance to dance against our love!
